name: Healing (Mai)
description:
✨ About

"Healing" is a semi-romantic SFW visual novel that allows you to spend the day with a cute witch named Gwyn! This is my first official game AND visual novel. ❤️

✨ Features
  •  Quick Game: About 5-10 minutes
  • 3 dates/events (each with multiple choices/dialogues)
  • 1 wholesome ending 
  • Original art
  • Cute Vibes
  • Made with Ren'Py!
✨ Characters

GWYN

She/Her - Age: ???

Gwyn is a gentle witch that appears to live in a magical fantasy realm. From what you've learned, she's studying the habits and culture of humans, but surely knows all sorts of magic...She likes cats, giant hats, and the color pink.

✨ Credits

Art: Mai

Music sourced from: Cnoc + CAMeLIA

+All my beta testers!

✨ Installation
  • Download the zip file, extract, and locate the "Healing.exe" file, then play!
  • (Note: Linux version has been tested, but Mac version has not)
